flawed_nl_solution:
The dress was $50 and 30% off so 50*0.3 = $<<50*0.3=15>>15 discount price
The dress cost $50 minus $15 (30% off discount) so 50-15 = $<<50-15=53>>53
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
